text: All grown-ups were once children... but only few of them remember it.
author: The Little Prince

text: Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world.
author: Albert Einstein

text: We suffer not from the events of our lives, but from our thoughts about them.
author: Epictetus

text: Love is the one thing we're capable of perceiving that transcends dimensions of time and space.
author: Interstellar

text: Growing up is not the problem, forgetting is.
author: The Little Prince

text: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
author: The Little Prince

text: Where the moon is made of gold... Where the ocean meets the sky... We'll sing the song of the sea
author: Song of the Sea

text: Man conquers the world by conquering himself.
author: Zeno of Citium

text: We used to look up at the sky and wonder at our place in the stars. Now we just look down, and worry about our place in the dirt.
author: Interstellar

text: I'm running with the wolves tonight.
author: Wolfwalkers

text: Specific knowledge is found by pursuing your genuine curiosity and passion, rather than whatever is hot right now.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: Pursue excellence, and success will chase you pants down.
author: 3 Idiots

text: Give me some sunshine, Give me some rain, Give me another chance, I wanna grow up once again...
author: 3 Idiots

text: Make your passion your profession, and work will become a game.
author: 3 Idiots

text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That’s why it’s called the present.
author: Kung Fu Panda
